title: Minimapscaling :(

embed.description: How to Increase mini map size in League of Legends How to Change Mini Map size Guide, I will be showing you how to make your mini map as big as Challenger players use it. â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬â–¬ â–º ğƒğ¨ğ©ğ ğ‚ğ¥ğ¨ğ­ğ¡ğ¢ğ§ğ : https://www.intotheam.com (ğ’ğšğ¯ğ ğŸğŸ%: ğŠğ’ğŸğŸ) â–º ğƒğˆğ’ğ‚ğğ‘ğƒ: https://discord.gg/Jj3EYqT

body: I have been trying to do this all day and i know it is allowed i was just wondering what i am doing wrong i do it 100% including the read only file part and still it  doesnt seem to work i get in game and minimap stays at 100 instead of getting bigger

replies.body:
Hey BeardedRussian,

I don't recommend you do this. I know he says in the video that you can't be banned for editing the game files, but that's not true. People have been known to have been punished for changing resolutions in order to gain an unfair advantage. In fact [**Riot Keyru**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/XhXwwb0f-permabanned-for-changing-gamecfg-even-though-riot-has-said-its-allowed?comment=0008) recommends you do not touch the game files at all. 

What you are doing here is essentially editing game files to gain an unfair advantage with a larger minimap. So yeah... don't do it! :D
